item.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds DLC ‘Minecraft Pack’ launches October 8
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Minecraft Festival to run from October 9 to 11.

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds downloadable content “Minecraft Pack” will launch on October 8, SEGA announced.

An in-game “Minecraft Festival” will also run from October 9 at 5:00 p.m. PT / 8:00 p.m. ET until October 11 at 4:59 pm. PT / 7:59 p.m. ET, which players can join even without purchasing the “Minecraft Pack.”

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, and will launch for Switch 2 this holiday.

item.title: Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror – Reforged announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Revolution Software has announced point-and-click adventure game remaster Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror – Reforged for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch in early 2026. A Kickstarter campaign is coming soon.

“The Smoking Mirror has always been one of our most loved games, and with Reforged we were able to enhance it in ways that respect the original while making it shine for modern audiences,” said Revolution Software founder and CEO Charles Cecil in a press release. “Just as with the first game [Broken Sword: Shadow of the Templars – Reforged], we can’t wait for players old and new to experience it again.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Revolution Software:

About

Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror – Reforged is an extensively enhanced version of the multi-award winning, all-time classic game.

While investigating a ruthless drug gang, journalist Nico Collard unexpectedly comes across an ancient artifact. Little can she know that the ornately carved obsidian stone will lead her, and her adventuring companion George Stobbart, into a mysterious escapade of intrigue and deceit, in which they must overcome powerful forces and antagonists who will stop at nothing to fulfil their evil ambitions.

Torment and terror, sacrificial rituals, and bloody massacre is unearthed beneath a veil of Mayan mystery. Kidnap, stolen treasure, astronomy, and deadly drug baron are the least of the duo’s worries, as divine forces threaten to annihilate mankind! Nerve, cunning, and guile are essential in order to conquer in this compelling adventure, guaranteed to leave you with an aching brain and a beating heart. Are you up to the challenge?

Reforged Features

  • Contemporary Adventure Gameplay – Discover the joy of a modern adventure style or rediscover the nostalgia of classic point-and-click—the choice is yours, as you solve puzzles, gather clues, and interact with a colorful cast of characters. Immerse yourself in an intuitive and engaging gameplay experience.
  • 4K Remastered Visuals – Experience the magic of the original game with enhanced high-definition graphics, bringing the picturesque landscapes, detailed characters, and intricate environments to life in beautiful 4K for the first time ever.
  • Enhanced Audio – Immerse your ears in the enhanced audio as Revolution delivers the finest, most stunning version of George and Nico’s second adventure to date, including the incredible soundtrack from world-acclaimed composer Barrington Pheloung.
  • Bonus Content – Never-seen-before dialogue restored from original scripts, plus secrets to unlock on game completion…

Choose Your Experience

  • Graphics Toggle – Seamlessly hot swap between original and Reforged graphics at any time!
  • Game Help – Integrated story recap, on demand hints, or automatic highlights as you play.
  • Mouse / Controller / Touchscreen – Switch between three fully supported control styles.
  • Streamlined Interface – Option Exhaustion, Fast Exit, Walk Assist, and Subtitle features, all configurable to your taste.
  • Autosave / Manual Save – Progress is safely stored automatically but you can also bookmark and relive your favorite moments too.
  • Dialogue History – Reread the previous conversation to never miss a word.

item.title: Metal: Hellsinger developer The Outsiders shuts down
item.content:encoded:
Studio affected by recent layoffs at Funcom.

Metal: Hellsinger developer The Outsiders will close its doors following recent layoffs at parent company Funcom, studio founder and creative director David Goldfarb announced in a Bluesky post.

Here is the message from Goldfarb in full:

Friends,

I have not had much time to process the news but all of us at The Outsiders and Funcom Stockholm have been affected by the layoffs at Funcom and our 10 year-old studio will be closing. Many of us had survived a near-death studio experience years back when Darkborn was cancelled, and because of this team’s loyalty and refusal to quit, Metal: Hellsinger was born. It will always be a high point for me personally and I will be forever grateful we got to make it and for the wonderful team and partnerships that made it happen.

We had hoped to do something even better this time—.

—things don’t always go the way you hope.

But we are not giving up, and we are going to try to continue on in some new form. If you think you can help in any way, with business leads, placement for employees, guidance, whatever it is, I would be genuinely grateful if you reach out here. Change is always tough and right now we are all hurting.

Thanks so much.

item.title: Narrative adventure game A Pizza Delivery launches November 7 for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A surreal and introspective journey.

Narrative adventure game A Pizza Delivery will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on November 7, publisher Dolores Entertainment and developer Eric Osuna announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dolores Entertainment:

About

Embark on a surreal and introspective journey with “B,” a pizza delivery rider on her final order of the day. Ride through a dreamlike world filled with strange landscapes, unexpected shifts in scenery, and moments of quiet contemplation. This isn’t just a city—it’s a liminal space, a shared mental realm where individuals grapple with unease and longing.

Accompanied by her trusty scooter, B must navigate this enigmatic world, encountering eccentric characters and uncovering their deepest desires and regrets. Share a slice of pizza with them, and perhaps you’ll find a piece of yourself within them.

Key Features

  • Meditative Exploration – Journey through a captivating world, from bustling cityscapes to surreal landscapes.
  • A Narrative Experience – Uncover the stories of the world and its inhabitants through environmental storytelling and character interactions.
  • Charming Characters – Meet a cast of unique individuals and learn about their dreams, regrets, and aspirations.
  • Solve Puzzles – Use your wits and intuition to overcome obstacles and deliver that final pizza.
